ratings.comment: Brandy is a great instructor. She is very knowledgeable and passionate about German and cares greatly for her students. I loved having Brandy as a TA and miss her greatly.

I came into German 101 expecting to hate it and have trouble learning the language, but Brandy made it super easy to understand! Her office hours are really worthwhile and I would highly recommend going to them. Make sure you do the homework though - that's the only way you will pass the class!

Brandy is a great lecturer.  She is very willing to help and sets you up for success.  She keeps lectures interesting by cracking jokes and showing enthusiasm for the material.  Definitely one of the best!
Brandy made my first semester of German the best I could've asked for. She was always willing to help and she challenged me. She made lecture fun and funny, and the material wasn't too dense.

Brandy is a thorough lecturer and a fair grader who sets clear academic expectations for her students.  She obviously cares about her students' success and overall well-being,  and I am sincerely upset that I will not have her as a TA or professor again. Anyone who chooses to take a course with her in the future will not be disappointed.

Brandy is absolutely amazing. I expected to absolutely hate German, but she managed to make it significantly more tolerable than I expected, and made it fun along the way too. The way she teaches helps you learn without too much stress. Highly recommended.

I've had a blast taking German 101 with Frau Trygstad, She's energetic, cares deeply about teaching, gets everyone involved, and makes class fun. Historically, I'm pretty bad at attending my classes, but I actively enjoy going to German 101 each day. You literally couldn't ask for a better teacher: she sets you up for success.

If you want to get F on your grade, then take this instructor. She is definitely not helpful for improving your English ability. She looks like grading D & F on each paper and every assignment. She always smile and say sweet words when you got a poor grade. "You trust me" If you trust her, you'll fail. just take other instructor. She's so mean.
